title: mvapich-gdr error when specific MPI not specified in spack.yaml

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
installing from `spack.yaml` file  fails because missing `mvapich2-gdr` which is only available via binary release.

Other versions of MPI should take precedence

### Steps to reproduce the issue

create a spack.yaml file with the following content
```
spack:
  specs:
    - hdf5+hl+mpi
    - netcdf-c
    - metis
    - netlib-lapack
    - petsc+mpi
  concretization: together
```

```console
$ spack env create test spack.yaml
$ spack env activate test
$ spack install

```
